channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson Electric -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson Electric -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1935|2024-08-02T06:05:26.782Z -- emerson%20electric -- dl8000
item.description: ROC800-Series RTU devices are vulnerable to an authentication bypass, which could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to data or control of the device and cause a denial-of-service condition.
